live_updates: We await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
35778.summary: Some customers in the Centennial area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services due to Hydro related difficulties. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35778.title: Apr 4 – Winnipeg (Centennial) | All Services - Hydro Related - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
35780.summary: Some customers in East St. Paul are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35780.title: Apr 4 – East St. Paul | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
